answers.answer: Keep them elevated when your sitting down, maybe trying a bath. You can also talk to your doctor to see what they say
Definitely mention it to your doctor. Sudden swelling is a symptom of preeclampsia. Your doctor might want to check your blood pressure and protein in your urine.
I was checked yesterday for it cause I was having other symptoms of it but all the test came back showing nothing is wrong.

I have a docs appointment tomorrow im goinh to ask my dictor because ive been swelling up lately and im not up all the time and when i used to be walking and up all the time i wouldnt swell up so im kinda worried

question: I'm 31 weeks and all of a sudden my feet are twice the size. What are some things I can do to help this? I already sleep with them elevated and don't eat a lot of sodium.
title: Swollen feet
